title: Baked bread and marmalade pudding
ingredients: ['Low-fat spread for greasing', '90 g (3¼ oz) mixed dried fruit', '150 ml (5 fl oz) apple juice', '3 tablespoons finely cut Seville orange marmalade', '¾ teaspoon ground mixed spice', '175 g (6oz) wholemeal bread, crust removed, cut into cubes', '1 egg', '300 ml (10floz) skimmed milk', '1½ teaspoons demerara sugar', 'A pinch of freshly grated nutmeg', 'To serve: 4 tablespoons low-fat cream or fromage frais']
